body_html: Yeah, this is a cool contribution, but best for an external repository -- if it became critical for state-of-the-art models, we'd probably want to integrate it then. In the meantime, feel free to point us at where you are maintaining this and we can link to it somewhere!
body_text: Yeah, this is a cool contribution, but best for an external repository -- if it became critical for state-of-the-art models, we'd probably want to integrate it then.  In the meantime, feel free to point us at where you are maintaining this and we can link to it somewhere!
body: Yeah, this is a cool contribution, but best for an external repository -- if it became critical for state-of-the-art models, we'd probably want to integrate it then.  In the meantime, feel free to point us at where you are maintaining this and we can link to it somewhere!
